attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are all on this planet for a very small amount of time and who has the right to tell people who they can and cant fall in love with if you manage to find that special person that makes you truley happy then who cares as long as your not hurting anybody.mean france abolished the incest law when it was under controll of napolian and its been goin strong. so people of britian lets be proude and let people love who they want to love.
